DOC.HEADLINE: HARDING ' S MOM COLLAPSES
DOC.TEXT: As Tonya Harding flew to Norway on Tuesday to skate in the Olympics , her mother , LaVona Faye Golden , collapsed on the set of " The Montel Williams Show " and was taken_to a hospital . Golden , 54 , fainted at about 1:30 p.m. EST , shortly after the taping in Manhattan , said Jennifer Geisser , a publicist for the syndicated talk_show . Golden was taken_to a St . Clare ' s Hospital , which said she had been admitted for observation and was in stable condition . No other details were disclosed .
